results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-55ffb895fb-f85d7

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: Get "http://10.244.2.2:80/wp-admin/install.php": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the request to the specified URL timed out.

Solution: 
1. Check network connectivity to the pod.
2. Increase the timeout setting for the readiness probe.
3. Ensure the application is running and accessible at the specified URL.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-55ffb895fb-f85d7], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service cannot find any ready endpoints because the specified pod is not ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-deployment-55ffb895fb-f85d7`. 3. Resolve any issues (e.g., image pull errors, crash loops). 4. Ensure readiness probes are correctly configured.
